name: Promotion Class - Stormcaller
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

Eschewing the balance of nature for pure destruction, the caller of storms has one purpose...

Grants the powers:
Resurrection
Kinetic Boost

The Call Storm power will now also apply a Severe Electrocution DoT to enemies.

Traits Granted:
Buckler Proficiency


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Stormcaller promotion class and prevents access to the Archdruid and Earthkeeper promotion classes.
